entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
